mapper.update: update web_banner set pic_pc = #{picPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_mobile = #{picMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pic_pc, pic_mobile, order_id from web_banner order by order_id desc
